location.name: Viridian City
location.des: A beautiful city that is enveloped in green year-round.

place.des: This academy is located in the center of Viridian. It is a place dedicated to teaching the basics of Pokémon to inexperienced Trainers.

here is a grumpy old man in central Viridian who will not let Trainers pass through to Route 2 until he has had his daily coffee. The man is simply a barrier in the game, preventing players from wandering past Viridian City until the player has gone to the Viridian Poké Mart and delivered Oak's
Parcel to Professor Oak.

The Viridian Gym is the official Gym of Viridian City. Trainers who defeat this Gym's Leader receive the
Earth Badge. The Gym is usually strewn with the same one-way spin tiles seen in the Team Rocket Hideout.

The man in the area that requires
Cut or
Surf to access gives out the
TM for Dream Eater
